org.rapla.mobile.android.activity

Class HomeActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.BaseActivity
        • org.rapla.mobile.android.activity.HomeActivity

  • public class HomeActivity
extends BaseActivity
    Home Activity This screen allows the user to show all reservations assigned to him. Furthermore can does it provide options to add new reservations
    Author:
    Saqib Razaq
